answerText: Temple Drake [or Temple Drake][10] Temple Drake, Gowan Stevens, and others such as the Snopes and Sutpen families live in this fictional Mississippi county, like most Faulkner characters.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 1 | 1 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This woman's daughter is smothered by Nancy Mannigoe as a result of letters she wrote to her lover, Alabama Red. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character, who becomes the wife of Gowan Stevens.
